import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const Form = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.post(`http://localhost:8000/apu/create/product`, product) .then(yomama => console.log(yomama)) .catch(badapple => console.log(badapple)) } const handleChange = (e) =>{ setProduct({...product, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (

Product Manager

) } export default Form
